thread.section_title: Park Plaza Victoria London - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Decent location
thread.title_full: Decent location - Review of Park Plaza Victoria London, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Rohit10_12
title: Decent location
text: Visited here for quick business visit. This is no fuss hotel, in the back side of Victoria underground station near vaxhuall bridge. Decent restaurants and supermarkets within walking distance. There is also a Argos store nearby. Going to central London or taking a national rail from this location is very easy. Hotel is quite Morden in amenities and rooms are decently sized for central London location.
